Articles.Content:
Hey, community! I've been lurking around for a while, but never made an account. I've been here since 0.23, but never really got far in the game until recently(HOLYCRAPILANDEDONMINMUS), because of a long break. I looked at 1.0.5 and decided to play the game again, this time actually thinking about stuff like delta-V, which led me to success!
I like modding my game, and I(as every other kerbonaut) watch a ton of Scott Manley.

Hello xdbv, and welcome to the forum!

Ah, beautiful, minty, Minmus. Dessert, mmmm. Glad you decided to come in from the cold, lurker.

Happy landings!
Sadly, after detailed sciency stuff I discovered that the Ice Flats are not made out of ice cream and the rest is in not pudding.
Welcome! Minmus is fun! Have a great time here!

Hello there!

Well that was about time! :wink:

After a surprisingly rough lithobraking on Big Dairy's favourite moon, my second minmus explorer has crashed, and the original craft, sent to help it, has also been left somewhat stranded. Time for a rescue mission! Edited November 25, 2015 by xdbv
